The [Pedagogues], one of the [id://238736|Orders of Monks], are responsible for maintaining the orderliness and relevance of the [Tutorials]. See [id://487572]

The [Pedagogues] don't write tutorials, but they are authorized to suggest and solicit new tutorials from the general population of the Monastery. They do this via the "bulletin board" known as [id://615833].
